column5: A friend of mine bent his prop on his 75 etec and asked me if I knew of anyone  in the ST.Thomas-London area that fixed props,I said I didn't but I knew some people that could tell me the best place to go so here i am asking for some recommendations.  vance
Try calling a couple marinas in your area for recommendations.Yellow pages if all else fails.Good luck.
I don't own a boat, but I'd suggest calling the owner of Lambeth Rod and Tackle.    He'll probably be able to help you out.
try ships ahoy in sparta,or there is also extreme marine and pier74 which are both in Nilestown....avoid hully gully way too expensive  also Stans marina in Port Stanley will be able to help you out
thanks guys i will tell my buddy where to go....
